dcterms:creator: D. Arya
H. Maeda
S.K. Ghosh
dcterms:description: The GRDDC2020 dataset contains a training set and two test sets, including 9 disease categories collected from three different countries (Czech Republic, Japan, and India). The training set contains 21041 pictures, and the test sets contain 2631 and 2664 pictures respectively. It is used for road damage detection.
dcterms:title: GRDDC2020

dcterms:creator: H. Zhang
Z. Wu
Y. Qiu
dcterms:description: CNRDD is a road disease detection dataset in China that contains 4295 pictures of road asphalt pavement, including 3022 training sets and 1273 test sets. The data includes 8 types of diseases such as Crack, Longitudinal Crack, Lateral Crack, Subsidence, Rutting, Pothole, Looseness, and Strengthening.
dcterms:title: CNRDD
